Package View

Class LoadDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • View.LoadDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class LoadDB
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the interaction with the user for the possibility to load databases. It manages two list to display the existing databases.
    Author:
    Benjamin Birner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
